| testCaseId | testStep | testCaseDesc      | restCall | header | queryParam | pathParam     | reqPayloadFile | reqPayloadId | responsePayload | responseId | statusCode | expectedResponse | addParam1 | addParam2 | addParam3 |
| TC001      | step01   | CreateCart        | get      |        |            | /api/users/2  | cartpayload    | c001         |                 |            | 200        |                  |           |           |           |
|            | step02   | AddTradein        | get      |        |            | /api/users/3  |                |              |                 |            | 200        |                  |           |           |           |
| TC002      | step08   | CreateCart        | get      |        |            | /api/users/23 |                |              |                 |            | 404        |                  |           |           |           |
|            | step09   | AddTradein        | get      |        |            | /api/users    |                |              |                 |            | 404        |                  |           |           |           |
| TC001      | step21   | Addprotectionplan | get      |        |            | /api/users/4  |                |              |                 |            | 200        |                  |           |           |           |
|            | step22   | Postcart          | get      |        |            | /api/users/5  |                |              |                 |            | 200        |                  |           |           |           |
